doc.field: Series II. International and Domestic Events
Series II. International and Domestic Events
Subseries II.A. Conferences, Summits, and Forums
Subseries II.A. Conferences, Summits, and Forums

This large subseries contains programs, agendas, schedules, correspondence, travel documents, speeches, menus, brochures, photographs, images, itineraries, press, video recordings, 16mm film, and VHS tapes from domestic and international conferences, summits, meetings, dinners, luncheons, forums, and other events attended by Rabbi Arthur Schneier. This subseries contains material from events that Rabbi Arthur Schneier attended individually or with his wife Elizabeth Schneier. A couple of these conferences were co-sponsored by the Appeal of Conscience Foundation. Events of note include: the 1960s protests for the rights of Soviet Jews, the 1998 United States religious leaders delegation to China, Rabbi Schneier's multiple trips to Israel, Hungary, and Romania, the 2002 World Economic Forum, and anniversary dinners in honor of Rabbi Arthur Schneier's vocational work as the senior rabbi of PES. Some material in this series is in Chinese, Croatian, French, German, Hebrew, Hungarian, Italian, Romanian, Russian, Spanish, and Yiddish. There are born-digital media--video and images--in this subseries.
